label: Doğan, Salıh & Nusret Ayyildiz.  2004. The first records of two cheyletid mites from Turkey: Chelotomimus (Hemicheyletia) wellsi (Baker, 1949) and Hypopicheyla elongata Volgin, 1969 (Acari: Cheyletidae). Zootaxa 583: 1-4.
